verses.verse: Do not rejoice,<WH8055> O Israel,<WH3478> with exultation<WH1524> like the nations!<WH5971> For you have played<WH2181> the harlot,<WH2181> forsaking<WH4480> <WH5921> your God.<WH430> You have loved<WH157> [harlots'] earnings<WH868> on every<WH3605> threshing<WH1637> floor.<WH1637>
Threshing<WH1637> floor<WH1637> and wine<WH3342> press<WH3342> will not feed<WH7462> them, And the new<WH8492> wine<WH8492> will fail<WH3584> them.
They will not remain<WH3427> in the Lord's land,<WH776> But Ephraim<WH669> will return<WH7725> to Egypt,<WH4714> And in Assyria<WH804> they will eat<WH398> unclean<WH2931> [food.]

They will not pour<WH5258> out libations<WH5258> of wine<WH3196> to the Lord,<WH3068> Their sacrifices<WH2077> will not please<WH6149> Him. [Their bread<WH3899> will be] like mourners' bread;<WH3899> All<WH3605> who eat<WH398> of it will be defiled,<WH2930> For their bread will be for themselves<WH5315> [alone]; It will not enter<WH935> the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>
What<WH4100> will you do<WH6213> on the day<WH3117> of the appointed<WH4150> festival<WH4150> And on the day<WH3117> of the feast<WH2282> of the Lord<WH3068>?

For behold,<WH2009> they will go<WH1980> because<WH4480> of destruction;<WH7701> Egypt<WH4714> will gather<WH6908> them up, Memphis<WH4644> will bury<WH6912> them. Weeds<WH7057> will take<WH3423> over<WH3423> their treasures<WH4261> of silver;<WH3701> Thorns<WH2336> [will be] in their tents.<WH168>

The days<WH3117> of punishment<WH6486> have come,<WH935> The days<WH3117> of retribution<WH7966> have come;<WH935> Let Israel<WH3478> know<WH3045> [this]! The prophet<WH5030> is a fool,<WH191> The inspired<WH7307> man<WH376> is demented,<WH7696> Because<WH5921> of the grossness<WH7230> of your iniquity,<WH5771> And [because] your hostility<WH4895> is [so] great.<WH7227>

Ephraim<WH669> [was] a watchman<WH6822> with my God,<WH430> a prophet;<WH5030> [Yet] the snare<WH6341> of a bird<WH3352> catcher<WH3352> is in all<WH3605> his ways,<WH1870> [And] there is [only] hostility<WH4895> in the house<WH1004> of his God.<WH430>
They have gone<WH6009> deep<WH6009> in depravity<WH7843> As in the days<WH3117> of Gibeah;<WH1390> He will remember<WH2142> their iniquity,<WH5771> He will punish<WH6485> their sins.<WH9128>

I found<WH4672> Israel<WH3478> like grapes<WH6025> in the wilderness;<WH4057> I saw<WH7200> your forefathers as the earliest<WH1> fruit<WH1063> on the fig<WH1063> tree<WH8384> in its first<WH8384> [season.] [But] they came<WH7225> to Baal-peor and devoted<WH935> themselves to shame,<WH5144> And they became<WH1322> as detestable<WH1961> as that which<WH8251> they loved.<WH159>
As for Ephraim,<WH669> their glory<WH9202> will fly<WH5774> away<WH5774> like a bird<WH5775> – No<WH4480> birth,<WH3205> no<WH4480> pregnancy,<WH990> and no<WH4480> conception!<WH2032>

Though<WH3588> <WH518> they bring<WH1431> up their children,<WH1121> Yet I will bereave<WH7921> them until not a man<WH120> is left. Yes,<WH3588> woe<WH188> to them indeed<WH1571> when I depart<WH5493> from them!
Ephraim,<WH669> as I have seen,<WH7200> Is planted<WH8362> in a pleasant meadow<WH5116> like Tyre;<WH6865> But Ephraim<WH669> will bring<WH3318> out his children<WH1121> for slaughter.<WH2026>
Give<WH5414> them, O Lord<WH3068> – what<WH4100> wilt Thou give<WH5414>? Give<WH5414> them a miscarrying<WH7921> womb<WH7358> and dry<WH6784> breasts.<WH7699>

All<WH3605> their evil<WH9567> is at Gilgal;<WH1537> Indeed,<WH3588> I came to hate<WH8130> them there!<WH8033> Because<WH5921> of the wickedness<WH7455> of their deeds<WH4611> I will drive<WH1644> them out of My house!<WH1004> I will love<WH157> them no<WH3808> more;<WH3254> All<WH3605> their princes<WH8269> are rebels.<WH5637>

Ephraim<WH669> is stricken,<WH5221> their root<WH8328> is dried<WH3001> up, They will bear<WH6213> no<WH1097> fruit.<WH6529> Even<WH1571> though<WH3588> they bear<WH3205> children, I will slay<WH4191> the precious<WH4261> ones<WH4261> of their womb.<WH990>
My God<WH430> will cast<WH3988> them away<WH3988> Because<WH3588> they have not listened<WH8085> to Him; And they will be wanderers<WH5074> among the nations.<WH1471>
